text:
Anthony Toby Hiller (30 July 1927 – 26 August 2018) was an British songwriter and record producer. He was best known for writing and/or producing hits for Brotherhood of Man such as "United We Stand" (1970) and "Save Your Kisses for Me" (1976). He was born in London.
Hiller died in London on 26 August 2018 at the age of 91.
